title: Were the Prophet's salla Allahu alaihi wa sallam Ruku & Sujood equal in length? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: Fida says I read that all parts of prayers of the Prophet Elisha lobster were proportional he would spend the same time standing as he would do in Recor and sujood can you explain does this apply to also the standing after rock or and also to the sitting between sujood and tisha hood should also they be equally long the answer is yes the Sunnah of the Prophet is awesome that his record he's standing up from rock or same Allahu Liman Hamidah his sujood and he's sitting between the two prostrations are equal in length this is the Sunnah of the Prophet Ali Salim as was described by his companions
